title: [插件权限问题] 指令牌子插件权限问题
author: qq1933168588
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: q983603969
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp default serversigns.use.*
/mangaddp default serversigns.use
/mangaddp EB serversigns.use.*
/mangaddp EB serversigns.use
输入上面的指令就行了
